sentences.english: Homeless people in the dictionary, there is no loneliness, not lonely.
sentences.chinese: 在流浪人的词典里，没有寂寞，没有孤独。

sentences.english: Rogues and Fighters now get a little more Stamina.
sentences.chinese: 浪人和战士将得到比较多的耐力了。

sentences.english: Lusty bloodthirsty not of light hang out.
sentences.chinese: 妖媚的嗜血不属光明的流浪人。

sentences.english: Hiro: Those are the 90 angry ronin , sworn to protect it.
sentences.chinese: 是誓死保卫它的90名愤怒的浪人。

sentences.english: Hiro: You have to defeat white beard and fight the 90 hungry ronin .
sentences.chinese: 你必须打败白胡子军并和90名愤怒的浪人作战。

sentences.english: One of the samurai who is seen walking through the town was played by a young Tatsuya Nakadai.
sentences.chinese: 穿过小镇的那个浪人武士是由年轻的仲代达矢扮演的。

sentences.english: The ronin had no such luxury and had to rely on his own resources.
sentences.chinese: 浪人没有这样的奢侈条件，只好依靠自己。

sentences.english: He cried out in the voice of a tipsy man.
sentences.chinese: 他以一个流浪人的声音喊道。

sentences.english: He ended up on skid row .
sentences.chinese: 他最后沦落到了流浪人的贫民区。

sentences.english: If the ranger shoots you five time.
sentences.chinese: 如果浪人芽你五的时间。

definition: bushidō or way of the warrior, samurai code of chivalry
horse thief/(old) group of horse-mounted bandits
